channel.title: Newsletters on Stop this train
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletters on Stop this train

item.title: Week 07/13/2020 - 07/19/2020
item.description: Wednesday Jun.15th, 2020 S&P 500, Dow Jones and Nasdaq were back to positive. Goldman Sachs reported a 150% spike in trading revenues. Many blue check accounts(including Bill Gates, Elon Musk, Barack Obama, Joe Biden etc.) in Twitter were hacked by bitcoin spammers. It took hours to go back to normal. Twitter’s stock fell 3%. Walmart requires customers to wear masks. Zoom revealed a $599 work from home package including a tablet, 8 microphones and 3 cameras.
